channel.title: [Bug-Minor]Scientist stuck in wall at Black Mesa Inbound
channel.description:
By pure chance, I happened to open up the console while in the Black Mesa Inbound tram and came across this error:
[code] NPC npc_human_scientist stuck in wall--level design error at (4353.00 1092.00 -974.00) [/code] Status:
hostname: Black Mesa version : 100001/24 100001 insecure players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max) map : bm_c0a0a at: 3514 x, 3494 y, -68 z edicts : 702 used of 2048 max # userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "The Silent Dapper Darkness" STEAM_ID_PENDING 06:37

item.title: [Bug-Minor]Scientist stuck in wall at Black Mesa Inbound
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
That’s safe to ignore, caused by a scientist on one of the moving trams.

Thanks anyway!

Read full topic
item.source: [Bug-Minor]Scientist stuck in wall at Black Mesa Inbound
